name: HumanHero
description:
Human Hero is a 2d Stealth game. You are playing the role of a little super hero who rescue orphans in a prison.  You can get pass the gates when you morphed into a guard. Morphing is key to this game, you need to find a way to hit a guard from behind to be able to pass the security camera's.

Controls

Arrows keys: walk

Space bar: Yell
